title: Live Show Update!
description:
Hey, Fam!!

We wanted to pop into your feed with a quick message about the postponed live shows - in case you haven't heard, we have new dates!

Here's all the info for you! And check out our website for details, too!

BOSTON
New date and location!
Saturday, July 31, 2021 @ 7:00pm
The Wilbur
- All previous tickets were refunded, so you have to repurchase your tickets
- Email info@boweryboston.com with any questions!

WASHINGTON, DC
New date!
Friday, September 17, 2021 @ 8:00pm
Capital Turnaround
- If you had a ticket before, it is still good for this new date!
- Email luke@unionstage.com for a refund or with any questions (include "True Crime Obsessed" in the subject line)!

PHILADELPHIA
New date!
Friday, October 1, 2021 @ 8:00pm
Underground Arts
- If you had a ticket before, it is still good for this new date!
- Email info@undergroundarts.org for a refund or with any questions (include "True Crime Obsessed" in the subject line)!

BROADWAY
Big announcement and new date coming soon!!!

And of course, you can always contact us at info@truecrimeobsessed.com with any questions, too!

xoxoxoxoxoxoxxoxoxo
Gillian & Patrick
itunes:author: Obsessed Network
dc:creator: Obsessed Network
